update.available: A new update doth appear! Click to fetch.
update.downloaded: Update ready to install when thou departest.

drop_cover.text: Drop a mod hither to install

onboarding.title: Welcome, gentle soul!
onboarding.description_download: Let us seek a copy of DDLC.
onboarding.s1_desc: Thou must download Doki Doki Literature Club from the official stage (ddlc.moe) â€“ click the button below.
onboarding.s2_desc: Once thou hast downloaded, select it below.
onboarding.description_location: Thy games shall be stored at {0}

login_input.details: A missive shall be sent. Click the link to complete thy entry.

change_username_input.details: Names need not be unique, for all are welcome.

uninstall_confirmation.message: Art thou certain thou wouldst uninstall?
uninstall_confirmation.details: Thy save data for {0} shall be deleted, and thou wilt need a copy of the mod to install again.

mod_delete_confirmation.message: Art thou certain thou wouldst delete the mod?
mod_delete_confirmation.details: Thou wilt need to download another copy of the mod to install again.

save_delete_confirmation.message: Art thou certain thou wouldst delete thy save data?

install.description_achievements: Continue thy play to unlock more achievements.
install.description_screenshots: Press S whilst playing to capture a screenshot.
install.description_sdk: This mod supporteth special features with the Doki Doki Mod Manager SDK!

install_creation.title: Install DDLC
install_creation.description_mod: Click to browse for a mod.
install_creation.description_vanilla: A clean copy of DDLC shall be created. The save data shall be separate from any other copy of the game.
install_creation.description_vanilla_global_save: A clean copy of DDLC shall be created. The save data shall be shared with other copies of the game (e.g. Steam).
install_creation.description_modded: A copy of DDLC shall be created, and the mod shall be installed. The save data shall be separate from any other copy of the game.
install_creation.description_modded_global_save: A copy of DDLC shall be created, and the mod shall be installed. The save data shall be shared with other copies of the game (e.g. Steam).
install_creation.status_exists: That folder already existeth. Choose another folder name.

tab_store_placeholder.title: The market cometh soon!
tab_store_placeholder.description_1: The Sayonika mod database shall provide a central place to share, download and review DDLC mods. When Sayonika is open to all, thou shalt browse mods here in Doki Doki Mod Manager.
tab_store_placeholder.description_2: Whilst thou waitest, download some recommended mods.
tab_store_placeholder.error: Failed to load the list of mods. Art thou offline?

tab_store.title: Sayonika Market
tab_store.subtitle: Discover and download DDLC mods
tab_store.offline_message: Thou art offline. Check thy connection and try again.
tab_store.maintenance_banner: Authentication services are down for maintenance. Thou canst browse mods but not log in or register.
tab_store.no_mods_message: Try adjusting thy search or filters

login.title: Login to Sayonika
login.username_help: Thou canst use either thy username or email address to log in

translation.enabled: Translation enabled. Content shall be translated when available.

section_backgrounds.title: Background
section_backgrounds.subtitle: Customize thy Doki Doki Mod Manager with backgrounds.
section_backgrounds.description_credit: Original DDLC backgrounds by Team Salvato.

section_storage.title: Storage Location
section_storage.subtitle: Change where thy game data is stored.
section_storage.description_moving: Warning! If thou changest thy install location, all thy mods, installs and save data shall be moved. This may take a while, and cannot be stopped.

section_updates.title: Updates
section_updates.subtitle: Get the latest version of Doki Doki Mod Manager.

section_testing.title: SDK Debug
section_testing.subtitle: Enable debug logging to test thy mods.

section_language.title: Language
section_language.subtitle: Change the language of Doki Doki Mod Manager.
section_language.description_restart: Language changes will take effect after restarting the application.
section_language.notification_changed: Language changed to {0}. Please restart the application to see the changes.

tab_about.title: About, harken
tab_about.description: Doki Doki Mod Manager is a community project to help thee find, install and play mods for Doki Doki Literature Club, a free Visual Novel game by Team Salvato.
tab_about.disclaimer_1: Doki Doki Mod Manager is a fan work and not by Team Salvato. It is a fan work, as Team Salvato's IP rules say.
tab_about.disclaimer_2: Doki Doki Mod Manager is not responsible for any damage to thy files or device. Ensure mods are safe to play.

jumplist.task_launch: Open Doki Doki Mod Manager and launch {0}.

running_cover.description_running: Close the game to make changes to thy mods.
running_cover.install_missing: The install could not be found.
running_cover.install_corrupt: The install is incomplete or corrupt.
running_cover.install_crashed: The game failed to launch or crashed.

game_browse_dialog.title: Locate a copy of DDLC's zip file

shortcut_dialog.title: Choose where to place thy shortcut

exception.title: Doki Doki Mod Manager crashed
exception.body: The problem hath been reported. Please restart and try again.

move_install.title: Failed to move install folder
move_install.body: Check that thou hast permission and enough space to move to this folder.

shortcut.title: Failed to create shortcut
shortcut.body: Check that thou hast permission to create files in this folder.

install.title: Failed to install game
install.body: Check that thou hast permission and enough space to install.

rename.title: Failed to rename
rename.body: Check that all interfering programs are closed and try again.

uninstall.title: Failed to uninstall
uninstall.body: Check that all interfering programs are closed and try again.

save_delete.title: Failed to delete save data
save_delete.body: Check that all interfering programs are closed and try again.

mod_delete.title: Failed to delete the mod
mod_delete.body: Check that all interfering programs are closed and try again.

renderer_freeze.title: Doki Doki Mod Manager stopped responding
renderer_freeze.body: If this issue lasts for a long time, close the app and start again.

executable_permission.title: Failed to make game executable
executable_permission.body: Could not make DDLC.sh executable on Linux. The game may not launch properly.
